Introducing War Thunder Store+: The Essential Extension for War Thunder Players

War Thunder Store+ is a must-have Chrome extension for avid players of the popular game War Thunder. This powerful extension enhances your War Thunder experience by seamlessly integrating content creator discounts, packs, redeemables, and registration bonuses directly into the Gaijin store.

With War Thunder Store+, you no longer have to spend hours searching for exclusive deals and bonuses offered by content creators. This extension simplifies the process by gathering all the valuable offers in one convenient location within the Gaijin store.

Here's why War Thunder players should install this essential extension:

Unlock Exclusive Discounts: War Thunder Store+ grants you access to enticing content creator discounts that are not easily discoverable elsewhere. You'll be able to take advantage of these exclusive deals and save on in-game purchases, giving you more value for your money.

Discover Exciting Packs: The extension highlights content creator packs, allowing you to explore unique bundles curated by creators. These packs often include special vehicles, skins, and other enticing in-game items, providing you with enhanced gameplay options and customization possibilities.

Claim Registration Bonuses: War Thunder Store+ simplifies the process of finding registration bonus opportunities. The extension collects registration links and bonuses offered by content creators, ensuring you never miss out on these valuable rewards. These bonuses can give you a head start, granting you additional resources, experience boosts, or exclusive in-game content.

Save Time and Effort: By centralizing all the content creator offers directly within the Gaijin store, War Thunder Store+ saves you the hassle of manually searching for discounts, packs, and registration bonuses on external websites or forums. Spend less time hunting for deals and more time enjoying the game.

Redeemable Codes: The extension provides a convenient way to access and redeem special codes that can unlock exclusive in-game items, currency, or other rewards. With War Thunder Store+, you won't miss out on any redeemable codes offered by the game or content creators.

Player Stats Shortcut: This extension includes a handy shortcut to view your player statistics directly from your profile within the Gaijin store. With a single click, you can quickly check your progress, achievements, and performance without leaving the store.

Total Spent Calculation: War Thunder Store+ goes the extra mile by calculating and displaying the total amount of money you have spent in your purchase history. This feature provides you with a clear overview of your investment in the game and helps you keep track of your expenses.

War Thunder Store+ is designed to enhance your War Thunder gameplay by bringing valuable offers from content creators directly to your fingertips.
